life.title: Back to school
life.subtitle: Moved to Auckland, New Zealand
life.description: Go back to school and learn something basic. Moved to another country and started a new journey.

life.title: Gall bladder surgery
life.subtitle: @Renmin Hospital, Beijing China
life.description: Sufered a huge pain by the illness and thankfully I rethink about my life, family and the meaning of this journey.

life.title: Be a father
life.subtitle: Had a baby girl named Zoe

life.title: Upload my first video to Youtube
life.subtitle: @Beijing
life.description: It was a travel video which we shot at Japan with our friends.

life.title: Engaged with Fang
life.subtitle: @Liaoyang
life.description: We did not have a very formal ceremony, but we decided to go together in the future.

life.title: Started a startup
life.subtitle: @Beijing
life.description: Started a startup with parters, we did a business for small companies to help them to share their videos to the customers.

life.title: Met my love
life.subtitle: We met at BFSU
life.description: Met the girl who is my wife now, and her name is Fang

life.title: Got my first job at Beijing
life.subtitle: Started to work at CS&S
life.description: I got the offer before I graduate from university, because the project mananger saw a game I made was popular online.

life.title: Touching code and programming
life.subtitle: Started to learn how to make website and Flash
life.description: When I saw one of my classmate was coding, I felt that a door was openning for me.

life.title: Studied at HAUST
life.subtitle: I went to Luoyang, Henane
life.description: It was really far way from home. University life let me feel freedom and satisfied. I learn a lot, but not from teachers

life.title: High School
life.subtitle: Studied at TLX High School
life.description: That was the first time for me to live by myself, without the cares of parents.

life.title: Middle School Part2
life.subtitle: Studied at LQH Middle School
life.description: It was a strange school for me, I left all my friends and started learning again.

life.title: Middle School
life.subtitle: Studied at WJJ Middle School
life.description: I entered the school with the third place, but this school is a bit chaos. I kind of lost my track of studying.

life.title: Second Primary School
life.subtitle: Spent the rest of my Primary School life at Shijia Primary School, Fushun
life.description: Transfered to another school for a kid is tough.

life.title: First Primary School
life.subtitle: Study at Shangtai Primary School
life.description: I studied at this school only for 3 years and move to another place with my parents.

life.title: Born
life.subtitle: @Liaoning Tieling
life.description: The palce which I was born at, It is in the north of China. many Chinese people call that place DongBei

desc: Actively participated in UGC website and SPA project design, architecture and development
Engaged in video app project of mobile native building, publishing and maintaining
Participated in idea, design, prototyping, architecture and development of online causal games
Collaborated with development team, product owner, design team and QA team in identifying website and application problems, testing methods and best solutions.
Worked with backend team to optimize API data structure and reduce bandwidth requests
Designed, architected and implemented large-scale commercial website project with core member of development team
Architected, implemented multi-functional video player (HTML5 version and Flash version) and upload component
Engaged in Facebook online game project HotTickets and Showstopper Basketball targeting U.S. market
Collaborated with customers to understand requirement, test ideas, and refine workflows
Responsible for the development team training, code review and task management
Designed, architected commercial video website for SMEs and implemented the core modules
Architected and developed online customer service products which include live broadcast, online whiteboard and chatting features
Engaged in backend API design and optimization
Built live stream services base on RED5 open source project
Responsible for recruitment and management of development team

works.company: China National Software & Service Co., Ltd.
desc: Implemented and maintained online monitoring system for warehouse which included data presentation, animation and visual effect
Communicated with product owner and design team for building better workflow and product ideas
Participated software system installation, deployment and debugging
Engaged with customers to understand requirements, test ideas, and refine workflows
